subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong may have finished 32nd in Tuesday's fourth stage of the Giro d'Italia, but he is the center of attention for Italian fans, who are watching him race for the first time.
snippet: Lance Armstrong may have finished 32nd in Tuesday's fourth stage of the Giro d'Italia, but he is the center of attention for Italian fans, who are watching him race for the first time.
